summary: Added comprehensive P2P networking layer tasks for ICN project: libp2p Core Setup (T021), GossipSub Configuration with Reputation Integration (T022), NAT Traversal Stack (T023), Kademlia DHT (T024), Multi-Layer Bootstrap Protocol (T025), Reputation Oracle (T026), and Secure P2P Configuration (T027). All tasks include detailed acceptance criteria, test scenarios, technical implementation guidance, and security considerations.

T021.title: libp2p Core Setup and Transport Layer
T021.rationale: Foundation P2P layer with QUIC transport, Noise encryption, Ed25519 identity

T022.title: GossipSub Configuration with Reputation Integration
T022.rationale: Pub/sub messaging with on-chain reputation-integrated peer scoring (v8.0.1)

T023.title: NAT Traversal Stack (STUN, UPnP, Circuit Relay, TURN)
T023.rationale: Multi-layer NAT traversal for residential and edge node participation

T024.title: Kademlia DHT for Peer Discovery and Content Addressing
T024.rationale: Decentralized peer discovery and provider records for erasure shards

T025.title: Multi-Layer Bootstrap Protocol with Signed Manifests
T025.rationale: Trust-tiered bootstrap (hardcoded → DNS → HTTP → DHT) with signature verification

T026.title: Reputation Oracle (On-Chain Sync for P2P Scoring)
T026.rationale: Background sync of on-chain reputation for GossipSub peer scoring

T027.title: Secure P2P Configuration (Rate Limiting, DoS Protection)
T027.rationale: Rate limiting, bandwidth throttling, graylist, and DoS detection

critical_path_impact: T021 and T022 are on critical path as P2P foundation for all off-chain nodes. T023-T027 support mainnet scale and security.
